## IExtendedModule interface

Extension of the webpack Module typings with members that are used by this Plugin

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IExtendedModule extends webpack.compilation.Module
```

**Extends:** webpack.compilation.Module

_(Some inherited members may not be shown because they are not represented in the documentation.)_

| Property                                                                   | Modifiers | Type                                                                         | Description                                                        |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [external?](./webpack4-module-minifier-plugin.iextendedmodule.external.md) |           | boolean                                                                      | <i>(Optional)</i> Is this module external?                         |
| [id](./webpack4-module-minifier-plugin.iextendedmodule.id.md)              |           | string \| number \| null                                                     | Id for the module                                                  |
| [modules?](./webpack4-module-minifier-plugin.iextendedmodule.modules.md)   |           | [IExtendedModule](./webpack4-module-minifier-plugin.iextendedmodule.md) \[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Concatenated modules                             |
| [resource?](./webpack4-module-minifier-plugin.iextendedmodule.resource.md) |           | string                                                                       | <i>(Optional)</i> Path to the physical file this module represents |

## Methods

| Method                                                                                                          | Description                                   |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------- |
